metadata.title: CVE-2024-36917 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: block:fix overflow in blk_ioctl_discard() There is no check for overflow of'start + len' in blk_ioctl_discard(). Hung task occurs if submit an discardioctl with the following param: start = 0x80000000000ff000, len =0x8000000000fff000; Add the overflow validation now.
